text: Pérez Pérez is a village in the Camagüey Province of Cuba. It is part of the municipality of Florida, and the estimated population is 76. ==Overview== The village is in the western part of the province, between Florida and Camaguey. It spans on the national highway "Carretera Central" (CC). ==Economy== The economy is centered on livestock and growing various crops. ==Education== The rural school "Escuela Rural Eduardo Panizo Bustos" is the only school in the area. ==References== Category:Florida, Cuba Category:Populated places in Camagüey Province
title: Pérez Pérez
